title: Ornn's short story is near perfect on every single level
body: And to me, the reason I feel Riot absolutely nailed it with Ornn's short story is that it actually feels like an ancient fable in the same vein as old stories of the Native American or Hindu gods. The language is simple, but gives explanations for how things were made and I don't know why but just feels the same as those real life stories. The fable involving Anivia and Ornn is probably one of the closest to a real life fable about gods you could get without it actually being real. Simple language, someone is arrogant and is taught a lesson, and it over-exaggerates to a ridiculous extent. I love Ornn's story so far, and cannot wait to see what else they do with him. (And especially Anivia and the surprise Volibear reappearance.)
